summary: AN ORDINANCE approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement of NORTHEAST 127TH STREET from 5th Avenue Northeast to 8th Avenue Northeast, by constructing watermains together with fire hydrants and the necessary appurtenances, ALSO, NORTHEAST 127TH STREET from 5th Avenue Northeast to 8th Avenue Northeast, by paving the same with three inches of asphaltic concrete on the existing street surface;
